Package com.example.coupv2

Interface WebSocketListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AfterCreateLobbyActivity, AfterJoinLobbyActivity, LobbyActivity, MenuActivity, MessageActivity
public interface WebSocketListener
Interface defining methods for handling WebSocket events. Implement this interface to listen for WebSocket connection, message, closure, and error events.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onWebSocketClose(int code, String reason, boolean remote)
    Called when the WebSocket connection is closed.
    void
    onWebSocketError(Exception ex)
    Called when an error occurs in the WebSocket communication.
    void
    onWebSocketMessage(String message)
    Called when a WebSocket message is received.
    void
    onWebSocketOpen(org.java_websocket.handshake.ServerHandshake handshakedata)
    Called when the WebSocket connection is successfully opened.

  • Method Details

    • onWebSocketOpen

      void onWebSocketOpen(org.java_websocket.handshake.ServerHandshake handshakedata)
      Called when the WebSocket connection is successfully opened.
      Parameters:
      handshakedata - Information about the server handshake.

    • onWebSocketMessage

      void onWebSocketMessage(String message)
      Called when a WebSocket message is received.
      Parameters:
      message - The received WebSocket message.

    • onWebSocketClose

      void onWebSocketClose(int code, String reason, boolean remote)
      Called when the WebSocket connection is closed.
      Parameters:
      code - The status code indicating the reason for closure.
      reason - A human-readable explanation for the closure.
      remote - Indicates whether the closure was initiated by the remote endpoint.

    • onWebSocketError

      void onWebSocketError(Exception ex)
      Called when an error occurs in the WebSocket communication.
      Parameters:
      ex - The exception that describes the error.
